description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Hi,

can you give us sender IP adresses?

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue. What sender do you mean?

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"

Hi,

pleas change your password to mail.

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hi,

we have block website https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Can you check if any files have been change on server? Can you sent us logs from server?

Greetings,

I don't have access to the server, please contact our administrator Mr. Harris.

Thanks,

Jane Taylor

Hi,

can you sent us mail address Mr. Harris?

Hi,

harris@mail.uni.ex.

I've sent my first mail to you with a copy to him.

Jane T.

Hi,

pleas change your password to mail.

Hi,

why? What happened?

Thanks,

Jan

Hi, 

we have detected you have visted the afromentioned site. As a precausion we are asking all users that visited the site to change their password.

Thanks for your clarification. I've just changed my password.

Jane

Hi, 

are on nice-project.uni.ex any personal data on this website which could leak?

Please check my very first email with the attachment. There was a file that might contain some personal data. I thought you checked its content. I was afraid to open it.

Thanks,

Jan

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content: Hi can you check logs from server nice-project.uni.ex?

Hello, 
Unfortunately, logging is not enabled at this machine.

Regards,
Harris
Can you create bit copy of server disk and send it to us then turn off server.  Do you have backup of this server?
Autoreply: sorry, I'm out of office till next Monday.

Hi, 

one of our employee has problem with this website nice-project.uni.ex - are there any personal data on this website which could leak?

Hello,

this is out of my scope. Please ask the owner what data are present at this site.

Thanks,

Ms. Hoffman

Hi,
its highly possible that sensitive information regarding the birthdays from our database could have been leaked. We don't know for surtain as admin of the server is OoO. Do you have contact for a Harrises twin. If this is becomes true, please prepare a public statement and notify legal.

Hi,

we must be 100% sure about the incident before we take any further action. Please double check that the exposed file contains any personal data.

Thanks for your understanding.

Ms. Hoffman
